basicInfo.name: Xiao
basicInfo.flavor: I think my master has died. I can't help but feel a bit sad. But as long as my talisman stays with me, I'll keep walking and talking and moving forward, obeying the last orders my master gave me.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 100% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 120% of Physical Attack.

Skill 1.name: Life Drain
Skill 1.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 230% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
 - Deals additional damage equal to 180% of Physical Attack against targets inflicted with [Bleed].
 - All Allies
 - Grants a Barrier equal to 160% of the caster's Physical Attack. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 270% of Physical Attack.
Transcend Lv.2 Effect
 - Single Enemy
 - Adds Effect: 100% chance to inflict 39% Defense Reduction. [Duration: 5 Turn(s)]

Skill 2.name: Rise, Zombies!
Skill 2.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 170% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
 - 100% chance to inflict Bleed [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 205% of Physical Attack.

Passive.name: Jiangshi Charm
Passive.desc:
All Allies
 - Grants Death Immunity. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
 - Grants Death Immunity upon using a basic attack 1 time(s). [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
 - Heals HP equal to 40% of the caster's Physical Attack when HP falls to 50% or lower. [1 Time(s) per Battle]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Healing: HP Recovery amount becomes 45% of Physical Attack.
Transcend Lv.6 Effect
 - All Allies

transcendence.transcend_7: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_8: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_9: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_10: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_11: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_12: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.

profile.likes: Flowers, children, people who resemble their master
profile.story: I think my master has died. I can't help but feel a bit sad. But as long as my talisman stays with me, I'll keep walking and talking and moving forward, obeying the last orders my master gave me.

basicInfo.name: Xiao
basicInfo.flavor: I think my master wanted to bring the dead back to life. Someone very near and dear to my master died on the battlefield, you see. That's when someone suggested creating undying soldiers that could be used to prevent anyone from experiencing the kind of grief and sorrow he had.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 90% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 90% of Physical Attack.

 - Deals additional damage equal to 160% of Physical Attack against targets inflicted with [Bleed].
 - All Allies
 - Grants a Barrier equal to 145% of the caster's Physical Attack. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 205% of Physical Attack.

Skill 2.name: Rise, Zombies!
Skill 2.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 155% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
 - 100% chance to inflict Bleed [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 155% of Physical Attack.

Passive.name: Jiangshi Charm
Passive.desc:
All Allies
 - Grants Death Immunity. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
 - Grants Death Immunity upon using a basic attack 1 time(s). [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
 - Heals HP equal to 35% of the caster's Physical Attack when HP falls to 50% or lower. [1 Time(s) per Battle]

basicInfo.name: Xiao
basicInfo.flavor: Hello, my name is Xiao, but you can also call me Number 23. I'm a jiangshi, so I act according to my master's commands. Even though I'm terrified of fighting, I'm incapable of running away, which can be stressful to deal with.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 80% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 80% of Physical Attack.

 - All Allies

Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 185% of Physical Attack.
